A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
So\, Rian Johnson basically did a magic trick for all of us that didn't like the movie.  He took our favorite puppy\, placed it in a bag\, and repeatedly hit that bag with a stick.  We're concerned about the well-being of our dog...meanwhile\, others are commenting what a bold and different approach he took with the trick and accusing us of being too attached to the puppy.

There's plenty wrong with every one of the movies; however\, the reviewer scores and the audience scores have never been further apart than 14%.  It's great if you loved the film\, but please understand that this isn't the usual "fanboys being fanboys" crap.
